data.message: I'm unable to sign into my page. .... PLEASE HELP? ????

replies.message: Hey Ljai. Over the next few weeks, we will fully deprecate the ability to login and use Facebook as the Page you manage. Pages will still have all of the same capabilities as before; people will now have to login with their own individual account and then select the Page they manage when posting, commenting on or liking other Pages. Let us know if you have any more questions. -Jordan
